name: Test Visualization Wrapper

on:
  workflow_dispatch:
  push:
    branches: [ main, master ]
    paths:
      - 'visualization_wrapper.py'
      - 'hf_method*.py'
      - 'economic_calendar_generator.py'
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main, master ]

jobs:
  test-visualizations:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
    - name: Checkout repository
      uses: actions/checkout@v4
    
    - name: Set up Python
      uses: actions/setup-python@v5
      with:
        python-version: '3.11'
    
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: |
        pip install pandas numpy matplotlib seaborn
        pip install -r requirements.txt
    
    - name: Test visualization wrapper
      run: |
        python visualization_wrapper.py
    
    - name: Generate HF Method 1 visualizations
      run: |
        python -c "
        from visualization_wrapper import VisualizationWrapper
        import json
        
        viz = VisualizationWrapper('hf1_visualizations')
        
        # Check if results file exists
        import os
        if os.path.exists('hf_sentiment_results.json'):
            viz.visualize_from_file('hf_sentiment_results.json', 'hf1_sentiment')
        "
    
    - name: Generate HF Method 3 visualizations
      run: |
        python -c "
        from visualization_wrapper import VisualizationWrapper
        import json
        
        viz = VisualizationWrapper('hf3_visualizations')
        
        import os
        if os.path.exists('hf_forecast_results.json'):
            viz.visualize_from_file('hf_forecast_results.json', 'hf3_forecast')
        "
    
    - name: Generate Calendar visualizations
      run: |
        python -c "
        from visualization_wrapper import VisualizationWrapper
        import json
        
        viz = VisualizationWrapper('calendar_visualizations')
        
        import os
        if os.path.exists('gold_calendar_2024_2025.json'):
            viz.visualize_from_file('gold_calendar_2024_2025.json', 'economic_calendar')
        "
    
    - name: Upload visualization artifacts
      if: always()
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
      with:
        name: visualization-outputs
        path: |
          test_visualizations/
          hf1_visualizations/
          hf3_visualizations/
          calendar_visualizations/
        retention-days: 30
    
    - name: Display summary
      if: success()
      run: |
        echo "Visualization generation complete"
        echo "Test visualizations:"
        ls -lh test_visualizations/ || echo "No test visualizations"
        echo ""
        echo "HF visualizations:"
        ls -lh hf*_visualizations/ || echo "No HF visualizations"
        echo ""
        echo "Calendar visualizations:"
        ls -lh calendar_visualizations/ || echo "No calendar visualizations"
